cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Installation__.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Installation__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Installation__.description: Contains information about the user to whom the deployment package is to be distributed.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgc_sync__API_Calls_Down__c.description: Number of API calls that are grouped by downloads since either the first installation or the last reset.

cgc_sync__API_Calls_Everything__c.description: Total number of API calls made during installation.

cgc_sync__API_Calls_Misc__c.description: Total number of API calls not considered during upload, download, and NFT (Named Fetch Tree) syncs since either the first installation or the last reset.

cgc_sync__API_Calls_NFT__c.description: Total number of all API calls that are grouped by NFT synchronizations since either the first installation or the last reset.

cgc_sync__API_Calls_Up__c.description: Total number of API calls that are grouped by upload synchronizations since either the first installation or the last reset.

cgc_sync__Avg_API_Calls_Down_Per_Day__c.description: Weighted average of the API calls that are down per day.

cgc_sync__Avg_API_Calls_Everything_Per_D.description: Weighted average of API calls per day.

cgc_sync__Avg_API_Calls_Misc_Per_Day__c.description: Weighted average of all API calls that aren't considered during upload, download, or NFT syncs.

cgc_sync__Avg_API_Calls_NFT_Per_Day__c.description: Weighted average of API calls for NFT syncs.

cgc_sync__Avg_API_Calls_Up_Per_Day__c.description: Weighted average of API calls for upload. It's calculated only on the view, and not on the persistent fields.

cgc_sync__Client_App_ID__c.description: Client app ID that the device uses and the user combination for a specific sync App_Installation__c record.

cgc_sync__Deployment_Package__c.description: Name of the deployment package that's installed on the device.

cgc_sync__Device_Model__c.description: Model number of the client device.

cgc_sync__Device_OS_Version__c.description: Operating system that runs on the client device.

cgc_sync__Encryption_Key__c.description: Encryption key of the client device.

cgc_sync__Event_Period_Length_Hours__c.description: Time duration (in hours) for controlling maximum event quantity limitations.

cgc_sync__Free_Persistent_Storage_Space_.description: Available storage space (in bytes) of the device.

cgc_sync__Installation_Date_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the package was installed.

cgc_sync__Installed_App_Version__c.description: Version of the application installed on the client device.

cgc_sync__IsEncrypted__c.description: Indicates whether the database on the client device is encrypted (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

cgc_sync__Last_Connection_At__c.description: Timestamp of the last attempted upload or download.

cgc_sync__Last_Failed_Sync_At__c.description: Timestamp of the last failed sync.

cgc_sync__Last_Reset_At__c.description: Timestamp when the last reset was performed.

cgc_sync__Last_Successful_Download_At__c.description: Timestamp of the last successful download.

cgc_sync__Last_Successful_FSOD_At__c.description: Timestamp of the last successfully executed First Sync of Day.

cgc_sync__Last_Successful_Upload_At__c.description: Timestamp of the last successful upload.

cgc_sync__Link_to_Device_Details__c.description: Link to the device details record.

cgc_sync__Local_Database_Record_Count__c.description: Number of records on the local database of the device.

cgc_sync__Max_Error_Events_Per_Period__c.description: Maximum number of error events that a device can send over a period of time (set in Events Period field), when Log Level field is set as Error.

cgc_sync_Max_Other_Events_Per_Period__c.description: Maximum number of events that a device can send over a period of time (set in Events Period field), when Log Level field is set as either Debug, Info, or Log.

cgc_sync_Pending_Record_Count__c.description: Number of records that are yet to be synced.

cgc_sync_Permission_Set_Assigned__c.description: Indicates whether a permission set is assigned (true) or not (false).

cgc_sync_Remote_Procedure_Call_Log__c.description: List of command instances executed by the client. .

cgc_sync_Remote_Procedure_Call_Queue__c.description: A semicolon-separated list of command instances (in order of insertion). Clients can use this list to determine the remote procedures that are called from the back end.

cgc_sync_Remote_Procedure_Call_Supported.description: A semicolon-separated list of command code names. Clients can populate this list to determine the remote procedures that can be called from the back end.

cgc_sync_Schemaless_Extension_JSON__c.description: User or project-specific data that's associated to a specific application without a schema.

cgc_sync_Status_BL__c.description: Indicates the functional state of the business logic.

cgc_sync_Status_FW__c.description: Indicates the function state of the Consumer Goods Cloud offline mobile app framework using a traffic light indicator. This field derives values from the Device Status picklist.

cgc_sync_Status_Sync__c.description: Indicates the function state of the Sync engine using a traffic light indicator. This field derives values from the Device Status picklist.

cgc_sync_Sync_Error_Message__c.description: Message to display when an error occurs during sync.

cgc_sync_Sync_Status__c.description: Status of the latest sync process. Possible values are: SyncError Synchronized Synchronizing AwaitingSynchronization

cgc_sync_TechPanel__c.description: Toggle to enable (true) or disable (false) the tech panel on the mobile device. The default value is false'\.

cgc_sync_Total_API_Calls_Down__c.description: Total number of API calls made during sync between Salesforce back-end and the mobile device since the first installation. This value is not affected by a reset.

cgc_sync_Total_API_Calls_Everything__c.description: Total number of API calls since the first installation. This value is not affected by a reset.

cgc_sync_Total_API_Calls_Misc__c.description: Total numer of API calls since the first installation, not considered in upload, download, or NFT syncs. This value is not affected by a reset.

cgc_sync_Total_API_Calls_NFT__c.description: Total number of API calls used to sync NFT (Named Fetch Tree) data since the first installation. This value is not affected by a reset.

cgc_sync_Total_API_Calls_Up__c.description: Total number of API calls grouped by upload syncs since the first installation. This value is not affected by a reset.

cgc_sync_TraceModeTill__c.description: Date until which the trace mode will be active on the mobile device.

cgc_sync_Trace_Mode_Area__c.description: Area on which trace mode is active.

cgc_sync_Trace_Mode_Duration__c.description: Total number of hours for which trace mode logging can remain active on the mobile device.
